Introduction
This topic contains information on processing awards and denials of Chapter 18 monetary allowances, including
description of the final stage in the Chapter 18 claims process
roles and responsibilities for processing Chapter 18 awards and denials
, and
award and denial process for Chapter 18 claims
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E - Authorization Issues
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section E
